- right/left align element in div
{{{class="lang-css"

display: flex;
justify-content: space-between;

}}}
  
- vertically align text inside a flexbox
{{{class="lang-css"

display: flex;
justify-content: center;
flex-direction: column;
text-align: center;

}}}

- Hide Element

    | Test               | `transform: scale(0)` | `visibility: hidden` | `display: none` | `opacity: 0` |
    |--------------------|-----------------------|----------------------|-----------------|--------------|
    | In document flow ? | Yes                   | Yes                  | No              | No           |
    | Invisible          | Yes                   | Yes                  | Yes             | Yes          |
